text: Slavoj may refer to: *Karel Slavoj Amerling (1807–1884), Czech teacher, writer, and philosopher *Slavoj Černý (born 1937), former Czech cyclist *Slavoj Žižek (born 1949), Slovenian philosopher ==See also== *Záboj and Slavoj, outdoor sculpture by Josef Václav Myslbek, installed at Vyšehradské sady in Vyšehrad, Prague, Czech Republic *Slavoljub * Category:Czech masculine given names nl:Slavoj
title: Slavoj
